Some engineers seem to be drawn by the work at a smaller company, which offers an opportunity to reshape culture with less corporate bureaucracy and more creative freedom. Facebook has become the cool kid on the block, and now Google wants to prove it can still be cool, too, says Danny Sullivan , who follows both companies closely as editor-in-chief of Search Engine Land.
